amendment.description: An amendment numbered 56 printed in the Congressional Record to exclude any oil and gas leasing on any Federal land where oil and gas leasing would result in or exacerbate disproportionate burdens on certain communities from the plan required by paragraph (1).
amendment.purpose: Amendment sought to exclude any oil and gas leasing on any Federal land where oil and gas leasing would result in or exacerbate disproportionate burdens on certain communities from the plan.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Grijalva amendment (A027) Failed by recorded vote: 213 - 219 (Roll no. 53).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A027) offered by Mr. Grijalva.
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Grijalva amendment (A027) Failed by recorded vote: 213 - 219 (Roll no. 53).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
